00019 /****************************************************************************
00020  * Public function implemenations

00022 int
00023 arrow_tsp_result_init(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_tsp_result *result)
00024 {
00025     if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(problem->size, &(result->tour)))
00026     {
00027         result = NULL;
00028         return ARROW_ERROR_FATAL;
00029     }
00030     result->found_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00031     result->obj_value = -1.0;
00032     result->total_time = 0.0;
00033     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00034 }
00035 
00036 void 
00037 arrow_tsp_result_destruct(arrow_tsp_result *result)
00038 {
00039     if(result->tour != NULL)
00040     {
00041         free(result->tour);
00042         result->tour = NULL;
00043     }
00044 }
00045 
00046 void
00047 arrow_tsp_lk_params_init(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_tsp_lk_params *params)
00048 {
00049     params->random_restarts = 0;
00050     params->stall_count = problem->size;
00051     params->kicks = (problem->size > 1000 ? 500 : problem->size / 2);
00052     params->kick_type = CC_LK_GEOMETRIC_KICK;
00053     params->time_bound = 0.0;
00054     params->length_bound = 0.0;
00055     params->initial_tour = NULL;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void 
00059 arrow_tsp_lk_params_destruct(arrow_tsp_lk_params *params)
00060 {
00061     if(params->initial_tour != NULL)
00062         free(params->initial_tour);
00063 }
00064 
00065 int 
00066 arrow_tsp_exact_solve(arrow_problem *problem, int *initial_tour, 
00067                       arrow_tsp_result *result)
00068 {
00069     int ret;
00070     int success;
00071     double start_time, end_time;
00072     CCrandstate rstate;
00073     
00074     CCutil_sprand((int)CCutil_real_zeit(), &rstate);
00075     start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00076     ret = CCtsp_solve_dat(
00077             problem->size,          // int ncount
00078             &(problem->data),       // CCdatagroup *indat
00079             initial_tour,           // int *in_tour
00080             result->tour,           // int *out_tour
00081             NULL,                   // double *in_val
00082             &(result->obj_value),   // double *optval
00083             &success,               // int *success
00084             &(result->found_tour),  // int *foundtour
00085             problem->name,          // char *name
00086             NULL,                   // double *timebound
00087             NULL,                   // int *hit_timebound
00088             1,                      // int silent
00089             &rstate                 // CCrandstate *rstate
00090         );
00091     
00092     end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00093     result->total_time = end_time - start_time;
00094         
00095     if(result->found_tour && success)
00096         return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00097     else
00098         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00099 }
00100 
00101 int
00102 arrow_tsp_lk_solve(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_tsp_lk_params *params,
00103                    arrow_tsp_result *result)
00104 {
00105     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00106     int cc_ret;
00107     int ecount;
00108     int *elist = (int *) NULL;
00109     int *cyc = (int *) NULL;
00110     int *bestcyc = (int *) NULL;
00111     int *tmp;
00112     int i;
00113     double val, bestval;
00114     double start_time, end_time;
00115     arrow_tsp_lk_params lk_params;
00116     CCedgegengroup plan;
00117     CCrandstate rstate;
00118     
00119     start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00120     
00121     /* Some of the following code is heavily copied from the find_tour
00122        method in Concorde's TSP/concorde.c */
00123     arrow_debug("Entering arrow_tsp_lk_solve\n");
00124     
00125     /* Set default params if none are passed */
00126     if(params == NULL)
00127     {
00128         arrow_debug(" - No parameters set, so using default.\n");
00129         arrow_tsp_lk_params_init(problem, &lk_params);
00130     }
00131     else
00132     {
00133         arrow_debug(" - Using passed parameters.\n");
00134         lk_params = *params;
00135     }
00136     arrow_debug("     - random_restarts = %d\n", lk_params.random_restarts);
00137     arrow_debug("     - stall_count = %d\n", lk_params.stall_count);
00138     arrow_debug("     - kicks = %d\n", lk_params.kicks);
00139     arrow_debug("     - kick_type = %d\n", lk_params.kick_type);
00140     arrow_debug("     - time_bound = %1.2f\n", lk_params.time_bound);
00141     arrow_debug("     - length_bound = %.0f\n", lk_params.length_bound);
00142     
00143     CCutil_sprand((int)CCutil_real_zeit(), &rstate);
00144     
00145     /* cyc temporarily holds a tour found by the LK algorithm */
00146     cyc = CC_SAFE_MALLOC(problem->size, int);
00147     if(cyc == NULL)
00148     {
00149         arrow_print_error("Out of memory for cyc");
00150         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00151     }
00152     bestcyc = CC_SAFE_MALLOC(problem->size, int);
00153     if(cyc == NULL)
00154     {
00155         arrow_print_error("Out of memory for bestcyc");
00156         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00157     }
00158     
00159     /* We start by building up a set of "good" edges for the heuristic
00160        to chew upon */
00161     arrow_debug(" - Building set of 'good' edges... ");
00162     CCedgegen_init_edgegengroup(&plan);
00163     plan.quadnearest = 2;
00164     cc_ret = CCedgegen_edges(&plan, problem->size, &(problem->data), 
00165                              (double *) NULL, &ecount, &elist, 1, &rstate);
00166     if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00167     {
00168         arrow_print_error("CCedgegen_edges failed");
00169         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00170         goto CLEANUP;
00171     }
00172     plan.quadnearest = 0;
00173     arrow_debug("done.\n");
00174     
00175     /* If none is passed, we construct an initial starting tour */
00176     if(lk_params.initial_tour == NULL)
00177     {
00178         arrow_debug(" - Building initial tour... ");
00179         build_initial_tour(problem, &plan, &rstate, cyc);
00180         arrow_debug("done.\n");
00181     }
00182     else
00183     {
00184         cyc = lk_params.initial_tour;
00185     }
00186     
00187     /* Initial LK call */
00188     arrow_debug(" - Initial call to the LK algorithm...\n");
00189     cc_ret = CClinkern_tour(problem->size, &(problem->data), ecount, elist, 
00190                             params->stall_count, params->kicks,
00191                             cyc, bestcyc, &bestval, 1, 
00192                             params->time_bound, params->length_bound,
00193                             (char *) NULL, params->kick_type, &rstate);
00194     arrow_debug("     - Found tour of length '%.0f'.\n", bestval);
00195     if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00196     {
00197         arrow_print_error("CClinkern_tour failed");
00198         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00199         goto CLEANUP;
00200     }
00201     
00202     /* Now begin the random restart phase if necessary */
00203     for(i = 0; (i < lk_params.random_restarts) 
00204         && (bestval > lk_params.length_bound); i++)
00205     {
00206         arrow_debug(" - Trial %d of %d to LK algorithm...\n", i + 1, 
00207                     lk_params.random_restarts);
00208         cc_ret = CClinkern_tour(problem->size, &(problem->data), ecount, 
00209                                 elist, params->stall_count, params->kicks,
00210                                 (int *) NULL, cyc, &val, 1, 
00211                                 params->time_bound, params->length_bound,
00212                                 (char *) NULL, params->kick_type, &rstate);
00213         arrow_debug("     - Found tour of length '%.0f'.\n", val);
00214         if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00215         {
00216             arrow_print_error("CClinkern_tour failed");
00217             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00218             goto CLEANUP;
00219         }
00220         if (val < bestval) {
00221             arrow_debug("     - Found a better tour (%.0f vs %.0f) so swap\n",
00222                         val, bestval);
00223             CC_SWAP (cyc, bestcyc, tmp);
00224             bestval = val;
00225         }
00226     }
00227     
00228     if((lk_params.random_restarts > 0) && (bestval > lk_params.length_bound))
00229     {
00230         arrow_debug(" - Final attempt to find tour...\n");
00231         cc_ret = CClinkern_tour(problem->size, &(problem->data), ecount, 
00232                                 elist, params->stall_count, 2 * params->kicks,
00233                                 bestcyc, result->tour, &(result->obj_value),
00234                                 1, params->time_bound, params->length_bound,
00235                                 (char *) NULL, params->kick_type, &rstate);
00236         arrow_debug("     - Found tour of length '%.0f'.\n", result->obj_value);
00237         if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00238         {
00239             arrow_print_error("CClinkern_tour failed");
00240             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00241             goto CLEANUP;
00242         }
00243     }
00244     else
00245     {
00246         printf(" - Copying over found tour\n");
00247         result->obj_value = bestval;
00248         if(result->tour != NULL)
00249         {
00250             for (i = 0; i < problem->size; i++)
00251             {
00252                 result->tour[i] = bestcyc[i];
00253             }
00254         }
00255         else
00256             arrow_debug("tour is NULL\n");
00257     }
00258 
00259 CLEANUP:
00260     if(ret) result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00261     end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00262     result->total_time = end_time - start_time;
00263     
00264     arrow_debug(" - Cleaning up...");
00265     CC_IFFREE(cyc, int);
00266     CC_IFFREE(elist, int);
00267     if(params == NULL) arrow_tsp_lk_params_destruct(&lk_params);
00268     arrow_debug("done.\nLeaving arrow_tsp_lk_solve\n");
00269     return ret;
00270 }
00271 
00272 int
00273 build_initial_tour(arrow_problem *problem, CCedgegengroup *plan, 
00274                    CCrandstate *rstate, int *initial_tour)
00275 {
00276     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00277     int cc_ret;
00278     int tcount, istour;
00279     int *tlist = (int *) NULL;
00280     
00281     plan->tour.greedy = 1;
00282     cc_ret = CCedgegen_edges(plan, problem->size, &(problem->data), 
00283                              (double *) NULL, &tcount, &tlist, 1, rstate);
00284     if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00285     {
00286         arrow_print_error("CCedgegen_edges failed");
00287         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00288         goto CLEANUP;
00289     }
00290     if(tcount != problem->size) {
00291         arrow_print_error("Wrong edgeset from CCedgegen_edges");
00292         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00293         goto CLEANUP;
00294     }
00295 
00296     cc_ret = CCutil_edge_to_cycle(problem->size, tlist, &istour, initial_tour);
00297     if(cc_ret == CONCORDE_FAILURE)
00298     {
00299         arrow_print_error("CCutil_edge_to_cycle failed");
00300         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00301         goto CLEANUP;
00302     }
00303     if(istour == ARROW_FALSE) {
00304         arrow_print_error("Starting tour has an error\n");
00305         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00306         goto CLEANUP;
00307     }
00308     
00309 CLEANUP:
00310     CC_FREE(tlist, int);
00311     return ret;
00312 }
